tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We had a doubt whether our 5 year old son has a thyroid issue because I , the mother had a gestational hypothyroidism so wanted to check for our children. and the doctor was so so so good in listening to his past medical history, seeing all past reports, examining my child physically and then finally telling us the good news that he doesn't have any thyroid issue. And he was so good and gave so much time in explaining to us about thyroid and our concerns about future and many other things. He is definitely recommended *** *** ********* *** ********. A very good and intelligent doctor.
**** **** ******* explains patiently and friendly. Gives suitable tests and medicines accordingly. Also  Children like him very much.

Every child is precious to their parents. When my daughter was encountered with a ortho problem, I was really worried on who to approach. My paediatric doctor suggested Dr. Hemchand and after an appointment with him all my worries were put at bay. I feel my kid is in safe hands. I believe that my kid will get cured soon.
